title.narrative: Support to the Social Protection System in Health

description.narrative: The project development objective is to (i) initially preserve and later expand the Popular Health Insurance's coverage of people without social security and (ii) strengthen the capacity of the Commission (for social protection in health) and state health systems to effectively administer the entitlements of the Popular Health Insurance.

provider-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

condition.narrative: The Borrower (through a notification satisfactory to the Bank ) shall cause the States to abide by the Ipp and GAC and collaboratewith the Borrower in the carrying out of the Project
The Borrower shall have the Project Financial Statements audited covering the period of one fiscal years of the Borrower
The Borrower shall prepare Project reports on the basis of performance indicators covering the period of one calendar semester
The Borrower shall prepare Statements of Affiliation Registry and have the audited covering the period of one fiscal year
The Borrower shall prepare and furnish to the Bank interim unaudited financial reports covering each calendar semester
The Borrower, through SHCP, shall enter into a contract satisfactory to the Bank among SSA and NAFIN (contrato de mandato)
